department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: "This course is an advanced research course that will provide students with fundamental knowledge and research experience of current topics in language and hearing. The course covers four current topics in the field of language and hearing including the fundamental acoustics in speech intelligibility (pitch contour processing, frequency sweeps, spectral and temporal modulations), processing speech in complex environments (hearing in noise performance, stream segregation), comparison of speech and music processing (commonality and differences, neural network), and processing emotions conveyed in speech and hearing (memory of emotional sounds, prosody). Students will learn through reading assigned papers related to these topics as well as applying the topics in research experiments."
goal.ch: 這堂研究導向的課程主要在使修課學生能夠有機會在適當的指導下完成語言與聽覺的相關研究。目標在於訓練同學建立研究及獨立思考的能力，並透過聽覺心理物理學、行為與腦造影實驗獲得實際經驗。同學有機會探討目前語言和聽覺上的相關議題，包含語言感知、噪音環境中之語言處理、語言與音樂之相關處理及腦神經機制，以及語言中的情緒表達。在此課程中，同學會報告與討論相關文獻與目前正在進行的研究結果，並將成果寫成論文報告。

content.en:
1. Fundamental acoustics in speech processing
2. Processing speech in complex environments
3. Hearing in noise perception
4. Comparison of speech and music processing
5. Processing emotions conveyed in speech and hearing
6. Cognitive neuroscience of speech
7. Neural basis of speech and music perception
